notes.title: Summary
notes.text:
SWT3000 devices are affected by several vulnerabilities. Two of the vulnerabilities could allow
attackers to perform a denial-of-service attack under certain conditions.
Siemens has released updates for firmware variant IEC 61850, is working on updates for the
firmware variant TPOP, and recommends specific countermeasures until fixes are available.
AFFECTED PRODUCTS
Â· EN100 for SWT3000 (iSWT3000):
o IEC 61850 firmware: All versions < V4.29.01
o TPOP firmware (affected by vulnerability 3, 4 and 5): All versions < V01.01.00
DESCRIPTION
The SWT 3000 Teleprotection system is the highly developed solution worldwide for identifying
and isolating faults extremely quickly in the high-voltage grid. Combined with existing distance
protection relays, it allows operators to reduce downtime.
Detailed information about the vulnerabilities is provided below.

references.summary: SSA-350846: Vulnerabilities in SWT3000 - PDF Version
